body_html:
@nairouz just ran above snippets in eager execution and both of these functions should work. You would need to add something like:
from tensorflow import keras
from tensorflow.python.eager.backprop import GradientTape
from tensorflow import keras as ks

Make sure to add with GradientTape() as tape: in your first function.
body_text:
@nairouz just ran above snippets in eager execution and both of these functions should work. You would need to add something like:
from tensorflow import keras

Make sure to add with GradientTape() as tape: in your first function.
body:
@nairouz just ran above snippets in eager execution and both of these functions should work. You would need to add something like:
`from tensorflow import keras`
`from tensorflow.python.eager.backprop import GradientTape`
`from tensorflow import keras as ks`

Make sure to add `with GradientTape() as tape:` in your first function.
